response.overview: Live from the Ivar Theater in Hollywood. Touchstar Media Presents the Poets in Hip Hop. Featuring some of todays hottest spoken word artists, including Bidget Gray (2001 Grand Slam Champion), Gaknew, Miss Kimm, Joy Jones, Gina Loring, Jahaira and many more. These gifted and talented poets speak on topics from racism to politics in a way that all can relate. This is one of the most significant spoken word performances of our time. One thats guaranteed to inspire and lift you to a higher level of consciousness. Each performance is incredibly emancipating and liberating. Representing a movement thats guaranteed to make history. So sit back, relax... and be entertained.
response.title: Poets in Hip Hop
